performance.title: Performance
performance.text: Astro ships 0 kB of JS by default; Preact runtime only loads in islands (<30 kB gzip first load).

batteries.title: Batteries‑included
batteries.text: ESLint, Prettier, Vitest, Husky, Commitlint, Rosetta i18n, Zustand state, image optimisation & more configured out of the box.

theme.title: Live Theme
theme.text: Update colors, radius and spacing in real‑time via Zustand store + CSS variables.

security.title: Secure
security.text: Optional Jscrambler integration to obfuscate production JS bundles.
